name: Wash Cycle
description:
Some people have no respect for the majestic washer and dryer. These are the kinds of people that just throw horse equipment right into those machines with no remorse. It really stresses me out. I just want to play some arcade games, and maybe watch TV, but somebody's gotta keep these magnificent beasts working, and that somebody is me!

The object of the game is to keep your stress below 100. Broken machines increase your stress go up to them and hold E to fix them. You can also relieve stress by "playing" the arcade cabinet (by "playing", I mean holding E next to it).

This project was a collaborative work with https://wwm0nkey.itch.io/
